descript.abstract: Existing Bus Operating Facilities (METRO Owned and Leased for Contract Services)

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.

cntorgp.cntorg: Metropolitan Transit Authority of Harris County, Texas

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

attracc.attraccr: Attributes that are there are complete. Additional attributes needed such as Date Built, cost, equipment, number of buses

horizpa.horizpar: Plotted Using Digital Ortho Photography +- 10' horizontal accuracy

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

edom.edomv: Address Number, Prefix, Street Name, Street Type, Suffix

edom.edomvd: Metropolitan Tranist Authority of Harris County, Texas

attr.attrdef: Entity in charge of facility operations

cntorgp.cntorg: The organization responsible for the metadata information. REQUIRED.
cntorgp.cntper: The person responsible for the metadata information. REQUIRED.

cntaddr.addrtype: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual. REQUIRED.
cntaddr.city: The city of the address. REQUIRED.
cntaddr.state: The state or province of the address. REQUIRED.
cntaddr.postal: The ZIP or other postal code of the address. REQUIRED.

cntinfo.cntvoice: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual. REQUIRED.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
